name: Downtown Dodgers
description:
Downtown Dodgers is a 4 player, first person game of parkour dodgeball. Players will be spawned into different areas of the map. They will be able to pick up dodgeballs scattered around the map. Players will be able to utilize mechanics such as wall running and scaling, dashing, ball throwing and catching to outplay and eliminate their opponents. If a player gets hit with a ball, they will lose health from their health pool until they are eliminated which takes three hits, causing them to lose a life. Players will have 3 lives before they “get out”.

Download the .zip and open the .exe
